Commentary: Mohammad Amir to Asad Shafiq, no run, full outside off, no swing back in, drives it with no timing, bounces to cover's right as he puts in a dive
Mohammad Amir to Asad Shafiq, FOUR, full and wide, Amir is looking for swing, but there isn't any. Instead, it's width at nice pace for Shafiq. This time he dispatches it to cover's left
Mohammad Amir to Asad Shafiq, no run, full and wide, this time it pitches and holds it's line. Goes between bat and pad as he slashes at it on the up
Mohammad Amir to Asad Shafiq, no run, back of a length, angled across the corridor, defended with an angled bat
Mohammad Amir to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, good length at middle stump, shapes in slightly, uses his wrists to turn it to fine leg without too much feet
Mohammad Amir to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, full outside off, tails back slightly, gets the bottom of the inside half on his drive and bounces back to the bowler
Imad Wasim to Asad Shafiq, no run, fired in flat, good length on middle, steps out, doesn't get to the pitch, defends
Imad Wasim to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, pushed flat and short at middle, punched off the back foot to deep midwicket
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, good length at middle, steps out and pokes it uppishly to deep midwicket
Imad Wasim to Asad Shafiq, no run, fired in at leg stump, goes back and tries to make room to cut it, but he's cramped and jams it into the ground
Imad Wasim to Asad Shafiq, no run, good length at middle stump, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot

Imad Wasim to Asad Shafiq, FOUR, shimmies down the leg before he delivers, makes him bowl down the leg side, pats himself on the back, smiles wide, gets on one knee and paddles it between short fine and square leg
Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, good length outside off, fraction wide, hardly any feet, but strong wrists as he drives it on the up past cover

Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, back of a length, he squares up to turn it down to fine leg, but it sits in the pitch and comes onto him slowly. Hits the sticker of the bat and floats up towards the bowler, but his follow through goes left and the fall lands to his right
Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, SIX, back of a length at middle, steps down the track and lifts it's over mid-on
Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, back of a length in the corridor, defended off the back foot

Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, OUT, Pollard holds his finger to his lips and says 'shhhh' after taking this. Back of a length, angles in but goes slightly out after pitching. Shehzad had already positioned himself to flick it across the line. Gets a leading edge and Pollard gobbles it at backward point
Wicket: ['Ahmed Shehzad c Pollard b Sohail Khan 11 (7b 1x4 1x6) SR: 157.14']

Commentary: Sohail Khan to Pietersen, OUT, has that carried? Sangakkara doesn't know. Goes upstairs for a caught behind. Soft signal is not out. This was good length outside off, KP poked at it without feet and got a big nick. Sangakkara stretched forward and dived to take this. He looked doubtful...but it's out! Replays show he took that cleanly. Big wicket.
Imad Wasim to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, good length outside off, steps out and converts it into a half-volley and chips it over the bowler
Wicket: ['KP Pietersen c †Sangakkara b Sohail Khan 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00']

Commentary: Imad Wasim to Rossouw, no run, good length on off, pushed to cover off the front foot
Imad Wasim to Rossouw, no run, full and angled across the left hander, sliced to point
Imad Wasim to Rossouw, no run, good length on off stump, pushed to mid-off
Imad Wasim to Rossouw, no run, arm ball, fired flat outside off, backs away and throws his arms hard at this, but is beaten

Imad Wasim to Rossouw, SIX, good length outside off, gets on one knee and plays the slog sweep. It goes high and just about evades the deep midwicket fielder who does well to get a hand on it but is across the line as he tries to bob it backwards into the ground
Sohail Khan to Asad Shafiq, no run, good length on off, steps down and drives it to mid-off

Sohail Khan to Asad Shafiq, OUT, 3 wickets in 4 balls for Sohail! Full outside off, he slices it to try and find the gap between point and a catching backward point, put it goes uppishly and straight to the fielder at point
Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, good length, angling in from off stump, tentative forward push and gets an inside edge onto pad
Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, full outside off, driven to Pollard who is in a wide gully position
Wicket: ['Asad Shafiq c Shoaib Malik b Sohail Khan 11 (13b 2x4 0x6) SR: 84.61']

Commentary: Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, back of a length outside off, walks at the ball and pushes it to mid-on
Sohail Khan to Rossouw, 1 run, good length on off stump, punches it to mid-off
Mohammad Amir to Rossouw, no run, back of a length, aimed at off stump, back foot defence

Mohammad Amir to Rossouw, FOUR, back of a length on off, not a bad ball, but Rossouw is in serious form. Slaps this in front of square. Deep fielder gets across nicely but stumbles as he goes down to field it
Mohammad Amir to Rossouw, 1 run, good length at off stump, pushed to mid-off on the up
Mohammad Amir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, pushed across the right hander at a good length, dabbed down to third man. The original dab.
Mohammad Amir to Rossouw, 1 run, full and swings into the pads, tries to whip it but only connects with and inside edge onto the pads
Mohammad Amir to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, back of a length outside off, tries to drop it into the off side and run, but connects it too well
Abrar Ahmed to Rossouw, FOUR, over the wicket, good length at middle, steps out and hits it wide of the deep fielder at the midwicket boundary
Abrar Ahmed to Rossouw, 1 run, googly, good length on off and spinning away, goes back and swats it to long-on
Abrar Ahmed to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, back of a length at off stump, turns away slightly, cut to backward point
Abrar Ahmed to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, good length at middle stump, backs away and pushes into the off side
Abrar Ahmed to Rossouw, no run, good length, tossed up at middle and it's a google again. Front foot defence
Abrar Ahmed to Rossouw, FOUR, another googly, good length outside off, uses the turn and plays the reverse sweep past backward point
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, back of a length slower ball, full and on off, punched to deep cover's right
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, off cutter, angles in from a good length outside off, hangs back and turns it down late to third man
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, good length outside off, turns it down to third man off the front foot this time
Bopara to Rossouw, 1 run, slower ball, cuts in at a good length from outside off, chopped to short third man
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, good length on off stump, goes on the back foot and pushes it to point
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, short and wide, backs away too much and loses his alignment for the cut. Finds the fielder
Pollard to Rossouw, no run, good length outside off, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
Pollard to Rossouw, FOUR, back of a length at middle, steps out, gets a nice batswing and creams it between the deep fielders on the leg side
Pollard to Rossouw, 1 run, back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
Pollard to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, good length, angled into the pads and pushed into the leg side
Pollard to Rossouw, SIX, slower ball, full outside off, clears the front foot and golf-lifts it over long-on for a painful six for the fielding side

Pollard to Rossouw, SIX, wow! This is some skill. He shapes up to play a paddle sweep as Pollard is about to deliver, then hangs back. Pollard has bowled a slower ball aimed at Rossouw's crouch for the sweep, but it turns into a full toss that he slaps over long-on. Serious talent.
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, back of a length outside off, backs away to play a late cut, but leaves it too late. Beaten on the outside edge
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, back of a length on off stump, cramps him for room, cut shot goes straight to point
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, cramps him outside off again, but the late cut goes to point's left this time and he has to put in a dive to stop it
Bopara to Rossouw, 1 run, good length at off stump, punched off the back foot through the covers
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, back of the hand slower ball, good length at off stump, drops it into the infield on the off side with soft hands
Bopara to Rossouw, 1 run, shapes for the paddle sweep again, gets upright but this time he can only push it to deep midwicket
Shoaib Malik to Rossouw, 2 runs, shapes for the paddle, gets back upright, drives it nicely to sweeper's left and comes back to bring up the fifty partnership
Shoaib Malik to Rossouw, 1 run, good length on the pads, goes back and pushes into the leg side
Shoaib Malik to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, dropped short at middle stump, slapped in front of square and past deep midwicket
Shoaib Malik to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, goes around, pushes it across on a good length outside off, pushed into the covers
Shoaib Malik to Rossouw, 1 run, follows him down the leg side, good length, turned away towards square leg

Shoaib Malik to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, ooh close, but not out. Full and on leg stump, he tries to flick it with soft hands and it raps him on the pads. But it sounds like that was an inside edge and it's not out
Abrar Ahmed to Rossouw, 2 runs, back of a length outside off, goes back and punches it to long-off's right
Abrar Ahmed to Rossouw, 1 run, full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
Abrar Ahmed to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, tossed up outside off, wants to slam this past cover but goes at it too hard. Bat turns and it goes down to long-off
Abrar Ahmed to Rossouw, no run, good length on off stump, hurries on him and jammed back to the bowler off the back foot
Abrar Ahmed to Rossouw, 1 run, good length on the pads, pushed to deep midwicket, and second half-century in a row under pressure
Abrar Ahmed to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, short and wide outside off, cut in the air, without too much connection, but it's in the gap between point and short third man
Sohail Khan to Rossouw, 1 run, good length on the pads, lifts one leg up in the air and whips it flambouyantly to deep square
Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, bowled from wide of the crease, back of a length outside off, punched down to long-on
Sohail Khan to Rossouw, FOUR, back of the hand slower ball, back of a length outside off and he steps out and slams this past the bowler and umpire. Imperial.
Sohail Khan to Rossouw, no run, attempted bouncer, he squats to show the paddle again but bounces straight back up to try and ramp it as it flies at him. That looked well above his head though.
Sohail Khan to Rossouw, no run, another bouncer and this time he has to get down fast as it tails back towards him. He's on the floor

Sohail Khan to Rossouw, no run, slower ball, good length outside off, steps out and tries to give it the full slog treatment, but it drifts away, pitches and goes further away from him as it beats him
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, back of a length outside off, and at his pace, it's not a good length on this wicket. He backs away and slams it past sweeper cover's right
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, slower ball, back of a length, comes back at him as he backs away, and he pulls it to long-on
Bopara to Rossouw, 1 run, good length, angled into the batsman, pushed to long-on
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, back of a length, angled in at middle stump, hangs back and opens the face last minute to turn it down to third man
Bopara to Rossouw, 1 run, follows him down the leg side with a slower ball on a good length, Rossouw tickles it fine but short fine leg gets across and dives
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, short, wide and slow, slapped straight to point
Mohammad Amir to Rossouw, no run, back of a length at off stump, punched to covers
Mohammad Amir to Rossouw, 1 leg bye, in the blockhole, angled down the leg, gets under his attempted flick, inside edge and onto the back pad

Mohammad Amir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, back of a length outside off, makes room and creams this nicely through the line. Races to sweeper's right and he puts in a slide just in time to get his body behind it
Mohammad Amir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, back of a length at middle, goes back and heaves, doesn't middle it and drags it over midwicket

Mohammad Amir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, attempted yorker, misses his length slightly outside leg, flicked between fine leg and deep square. Slight mix up and Rossouw has to scramble back and put in a dive to be sure. Referred upstairs and not out. The throw wasn't great - high and wide

Mohammad Amir to Rossouw, 1 run, short and angled into the ribs from off stump, attempted pull but he's late to it. Catches the top of his bat and it rolls into the midwicket region where Amir gets across quickly and keeps it to a single
Bopara to Rossouw, 1 run, good length outside off, chopped to short third man, and a risky single well taken
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, full and angled in to the pads, backs away and slaps it to mid-off's left but Imad Wasim puts in a superb dive and doesn't let it get past the infield
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, slower ball floated full outside off, hangs back and this time it's past covers and no amount of diving will stop this one
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, short and wide, cut away to deep point
Bopara to Rossouw, 1 run, back of a length at middle, goes back and pulls to deep midwicket
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, short and angled in, pulls it behind square, fine leg runs to his left and slides on his knees to save the boundary
Imad Wasim to Rossouw, 2 runs, low full toss from around the wicket, plays the reverse, it goes straight to short third man, who might've come close with a direct hit. Instead, it's overthrows
Imad Wasim to Rossouw, 1 run, good length at middle stump, steps out and goes for the slog, gets an inside edge that trickles past Sanga
Imad Wasim to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, in the blockhole at middle stump, backs away and chops it to point
Imad Wasim to Rossouw, 1 run, fired in at yorker length outside off, slammed down to long-off

Imad Wasim to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, good length at off stump, goes for a wild slog sweep, gets a leading edge that goes to long-off, they scramble back for too even as Pollard fires in a throw at the strikers end
Imad Wasim to Sarfraz Ahmed, SIX, low full toss outside leg, gets low and sweeps it over the long leg boundary to bring up his half-century

Mohammad Amir to Rossouw, no run, slower bouncer, angles into him after pitching, goes for the upper cut, doesn't connect. Sanga is shouting animatedly behind the stumps. Rossouw doesn't understand why.
Mohammad Amir to Rossouw, 1 run, well-directed bouncer at his neck, goes for the hook but isn't in control of this. Falls about 5 yards in front of Malik at fine leg who is running in
Mohammad Amir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, back of a length on the hips, swung away to fine leg

Mohammad Amir to Rossouw, 2 runs, woeful running. Steps out at a good length ball, bat turns in his hand as it rolls down to Pollard at long-on. They come back for the second as he gets it in his hands and he's short by at least 6 metres as the the throw misses

Mohammad Amir to Rossouw, no run, full and tailing down leg, goes for the paddle and misses. That was close. Oh what's this drama? Sarfraz thought the ball's dead and walked out at the non-strikers. Imad has cheekily taken the bails off. Third umpire. Sarfraz is livid with the umpire. But replays show he just made it back.
Mohammad Amir to Rossouw, FOUR, good yorker at leg stump, couldn't do much but throw his bat at it. Inside edge and races past Sangakkara
Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, short and wide, cut to deep point
Sohail Khan to Rossouw, 1 leg bye, good yorker at leg stump. Squeezes it out and turns it to short fine
Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, back of a length outside off, and seams away after pitching. Past his outside edge as he slashes at this
Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, full outside off and swings back in, driven to long-on's left and this is top-class running. No hesitation, loud call, and enforces a fumble from the fielder
Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, slower ball outside off, hangs back and chops it down to third man
Sohail Khan to Rossouw, 1 run, excellent yorker, directed at off and middle, digs it out unconvincingly to deep square. End of a great spell from Sohail.

Pollard to Rossouw, FOUR, ....but there won't be a next time. Full toss outside off, slapped in front of sweeper cover and that's a second win for Quetta Gladiators. Ease past Karachi Kings by seven wickets thanks to this unbroken 130 run partnership.
